ovdesc.p: This table is used to store and maintain the Unrealized P&L, Nominal Amount and Outstanding Contracts from the application likes Derivatives, Swap, FX forward contracts and FRA

desc.p: This field is used to store the contract amount if there is unrealised profit for the contract
This field is used to store the unrealised profit amount of the contract
This field is used to store the total number of contract which has unrealised profit
This field is used to store the contract amount if there is unrealised loss for the contract
This field is used to store the unrealised loss amount of the contract
This field is used to store the total number of contract which has unrealised loss
